title: october 30: a college goes co-ed
description:
Today on 365 Days with mxmtoon, Maia goes back to the 1800’s, when Oberlin Collegiate Institute (now Oberlin College,) became the first university to admit women. Afterwards, she talks about the first ever fusion of pop music and physics. Join this episode today and make sure you’re following along with the daily updates @365daysmxmtoon on all platforms.
Learn more about your ad choices. Visit megaphone.fm/adchoices
